kpi.name: sgsn_798b
kpi.formula: (iusm.iu_mo_sec_pdp_activation_succ + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_26 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_30 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_31 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_32 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_33 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_34 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_41 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_42 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_43 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_44 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_45 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_46 + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_pro + iusm.iu_fail_sec_mo_pdp_act_oth + nvl(iusm.iu_fail_mo_sec_pdp_act_rej_sgw,0))

kpi_info.title: Iu MO secondary PDP activation attempts
kpi_info.use: This KPI shows the amount of mobile originated secondary PDP activation attempts from Iu interface
kpi_info.formula:
sum(IU_MO_SEC_PDP_ACTIVATION_SUCC +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_26 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_30 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_31 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_32 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_33 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_34 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_41 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_42 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_43 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_44 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_45 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_46 +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_PRO +
IU_FAIL_SEC_MO_PDP_ACT_OTH +
IU_FAIL_MO_SEC_PDP_ACT_REJ_SGW)

counters from table(s):p_sgsn_iu_session_mgmt

kpi.kpi_alias: Iu MO secondary PDP activation attempts
